text: James Hudson Taylor 戴德生 (21 May 1832 – 3 June 1905) was a British Protestant Christian missionary to China. He started the China Inland Mission (CIM) (now OMF International). Taylor spent 51 years in China. ==Other websites== Category:1832 births Category:1905 deaths Category:Baptist ministers Category:English Christian writers Category:English physicians Category:English Protestants Category:Christian missionaries Category:Writers from Yorkshire Category:People from Barnsley
title: Hudson Taylor
